title: Pooh-Dyr/Poohdyr
body:
{{champion:77}} Riot asks for rights from Disney, and creates a Winnie The Pooh skin for Udyr. This could potentially open the world for skins for all champions. And of course result in profit for Disney and Riot/10Cent.. but ultimately we would all get to rep our favorite Disney and say Star Wars themed skins/characters. 

Or should league skins stay more unique unlike the sailor moon star guardian skin look alike

replies.body:
Can't have a Pooh-dyr skin because it would get censored in China because of a meme. 

Not a joke either.

https://www.bbc.com/news/blogs-china-blog-40627855
THEN LEAGUE CAN BE AT DISNEYWORLD AND DISNEYLAND üòç
As an Udyr main. I want and Udyr skin, but he already has one where he's a costume. I think this might be too similar to suprise party Udyr.

OR! Genderbend Christopher Robin Annie with Pooh Bear Tibbers!

But all of the yes either way
I get the feeling that Riot would prefer not to lose a large chunk of skin sales to royalties.
i would buy that skina nd i dont play uydr
Only if Tiger Stance turns him into a bouncing Tigger.
